title: Jad Dahshan
copy: Jad (they/them) is a fourth-year undergraduate at the University of Chicago majoring in art history with a minor in chemistry. Currently based in Boca Raton, Florida, they are working remotely as a research and writing intern for artmejo , a Jordanian arts and culture platform and online publication. They write about global contemporary art with a focus on Southwest Asia and North Africa (the SWANA region), and are interested in pursuing curatorial and conservation work in the future.   Contact Information: jad.dahshan13@gmail.com   Return to the Current and Former Interns and Fellows page.
